channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Just next to bus stop outside Crown Hotel, 2nd February
item.description:
Long 4 metre pothole opened up, many merged together, at a pinch point where buses stop and to avoid have to swerve into oncoming traffic. Electrical cables sticking out of the potholes, this extremely dangerous and needs fixing immediatly. This whole road is terrible and needs complete resurfacing as a matter of danger to life. This has been there and reported multiple times for months. please fix.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cricklewood Broadway, Cricklewood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Workers on the green, 2nd February
item.description:
There were workers on elmers end green today looked like they were doing work to a bench. They got out their vans on a very busy roundabout in dark clothes. It was dark and wet and were hard to see. Should they not have been wearing hi vis' or reflectors for work near a busy road?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barrier, 2nd February
item.description:
Had a car cross over installed on the 17 th December and was told the barrier would be collected in a few days . It is the 2rd of February 2026 and I have contacted you regarding the collection report reference number 8778086. The barrier has still not been collected and is becoming a complete pain outside my house and have to keep moving it to use the crossover. Can you please remove it this week please. Thank you. Trevor Joy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Langdon Shaw, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 2nd February
item.description:
On the corner of Radfield Way da15 a mattress has been dumped. Some rubbish has also over spilled from the garden alongside of the mattress The fly tipping seems to be a regular spot for some.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Halfway Street, Sidcup
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect parking makings painted across driveway, 2nd February
item.description:
Over a year ago box parking bays were painted incorrectly on two roads we were told the problem was going to be resolved. My drive was painted in as a result I haven't been able to my off road drive in over a year as I get blocked in for days at a time, also my drop kerb line was never repainted at the same time as everyone else on my street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Byne Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Rubbish Dumping Near Lake, 2nd February
item.description:
There is ongoing illegal rubbish dumping near the lake located in a public green Gallions park area. The Large amounts of waste, including plastic bottles, packaging, and other household rubbish, have been left in and around the vegetation close to the water. This situation is having a clear negative impact on local wildlife and the surrounding ecosystem. The waste poses a serious risk to birds and other animals through ingestion, entanglement, and pollution of the water. It also degrades a natural area that should be protected and enjoyed by the community.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Close, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
